law.catch_line: This section applies only in the City of Annapolis in Anne Arundel County....

text.section: This section applies only in the City of Annapolis in Anne Arundel County.

Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, the city may issue a beer, wine and liquor license which authorizes the holder to keep for sale and sell beer, wine, and liquor at any establishment within the city for consumption on the premises only.
